'''''giliath''''' is [[Sindarin]] for "hosts of stars".<ref name=RC>{{HM|UI}}, p. 232</ref>
==Etymology==
The first element is ''[[gil]]'' ("star"),<ref name=RC/> and the second element is likely the class-plural ending ''[[-ath]]''.

==Examples==
*''[[Osgiliath#Etymology|Os'''giliath''']]'' = "Citadel of the Stars"
*''[[Dagor-nuin-Giliath|Dagor-nuin-'''Giliath''']]'' = "Battle-under-Stars"
